SELECT c.id AS categoryId, c.name AS categoryName, IFNULL(SUM(oi.quantity), 0) AS totalQuantity, IFNULL(SUM(oi.subtotal), 0) AS totalSales FROM order_item oi INNER JOIN `order` o ON oi.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN book b ON oi.book_id = b.id LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE o.status IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY totalSales DESC
